intro_text_one: Support your local restaurants, on a platform that gives them a bigger share of what you pay.
intro_text_two: 10% back in your wallet, to spend again in future.
intro_text_three: Top up your Peepl wallet, as much or as little as you like, directly from your bank account using Stripe. It’s fast & secure.
intro_text_four: We’re bringing people and restaurants together, over the food we all love. Thank you for joining us at the start of our journey!
intro_title_three: We give restaurants more by charging them fair fees.
wallet_protected_text: Great, you’ve backed up your secret phrase. Remember to keep your secret phrase in a safe and secure place and never let anyone know what it is.
write_words: write down the words in order and keep safe. You won’t be able to recover your account without it.
fuse_studio: You can switch to a new community by entering your Asset ID (available from the Fuse Studio) or scanning a QR code
enable_text:
Your contacts will not be saved on our 
 server and this action will not send  
 them any messages
enable_contacts_text:
Enable contact sync to send
 money to your phone contacts
scan_to_receive: Scan the QR code to receive money
restore_words: This is a 12 word phrase you were given when you created your previous wallet
enter_phone_number: Please enter your phone number so we can setup your account
pickup_display_name_text: This name will be shown to contacts that send you money to identify your account
we_just_sent: We just sent a message to
enter_verification_code:
Please enter 6-digit code from
 that message here
not_enough_balance: Not enough balance in your account
choose_lock_method: Please choose how your prefer to protect your wallet by selecting the following methods
name: Name
connection: please fix your internet connection and try again!
reset_account: Creating a new account will reset your existing account - are you sure you want to continue?
we_notice: We notice you haven’t backup your wallet yet.
to_protect: To protect your money and wallet go now to the settings and back up your wallet in few easy steps
will_never_share: Peepl will never share this information with 3rd party.
stores_private: Peepl stores private information locally on the device. Only the phone number is used to be able to verify your identity and reduce friction when sending money to phone contacts.
